meaningMnemonic: You want to go to the <radical>sun</radical> so you set up a <radical>slide</radical> <radical>twenty</radical> stories tall so you can <kanji>ascend</kanji> into the heavens.
readingMnemonic: You need to <kanji>ascend</kanji> into the sky and toward the sun because the <reading>Shou</reading>gun (しょう) said so. He's testing out some space travel technology (the twenty story slide) and you're his guinea pig.
